I Am Rohit Singh

FrontEnd React Web Developer

I specialize in building FrontEnd, Responsive Website.

View My Work

I SPECIALIZE IN

I Build Responsive Website with React, Redux custom CSS using SASS

CONCEPTING

All parts of a website: the UI design, the information architecture, the interaction design, the content strategy, the content choreography, even the coding, all involve conceptual work.

CODING

Do you want to learn how to code a website? Behind the scenes, most website code contains HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. As a beginner, learning these programming languages (even at a beginner level) requires hours of studying and practice.

VISUALISATION

Visualizing your website using a sitemap (also known as site architecture map) is a decisive step because it helps in creating coherent navigation paths for users to follow through the website.

INTERACTION

User interaction on your website provides you the opportunity to collect data about your customers and potential new customers. You can use these data points to make strategic business decisions.
